attributes.action: Sack Jack Straw and the E-petitions team now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: jack straw along with the rest of the government and the e-petititions team, are dening people the right to protest and the freedom of speech....free ron biggs

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
